thread.title: functional hotel for downtwon
thread.title_full: functional hotel for downtwon - Review of Millenium Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: henmeyr
title: functional hotel for downtwon
text:
The hotel is located just off Broadway in the downtown area, next door to Century 21 shopping and across the raod from the PATH train and WTC site making transport easy. The rooms are basic Hilton and the corridors needs updating. The facilities are above average. A medium sized pool on the 5th floor distinguishes this from most manhattan hotels.
Buffet breakfast had an excellent choice and great service. Bar area is dated. The hotel is pricey for the overall level of amenity.
Room Tip: Go for the higher floors - it is worth the extra money See more room tips
